messages.subject: on the shelf...
messages.msgSnippet: so, what s everyone reading?  I ve picked up a really eclectic mix from the library, an HTML guide, a gardening book, The Te of Piglet (they didn t have the
messages.messageBody:
so, what's everyone reading?  I've picked up a really eclectic mix from the library, an HTML guide, a gardening book, 'The Te of Piglet' (they didn't have the Tao of Pooh) 'The Birth of a Mother' and 3 fantasy novels, 2 Anne McCaffrey 'Pern' books and one David Gemmell, the first I've read of his.  Needless to say, the only ones I've finished yet are the Anne McCaffrey's; they're light-relief against a project I've taken on that I don't know how to do.  (which is a point, if anyone's overly familiar with Lotus Approach, I'd be extremely glad to hear from them <g>)
 
The only problem now is finding time to read them all before they have to go back!
 
Tracy
